changeSet.sql: create table if not exists Person ( id integer not null, age integer, name varchar(255), surname varchar(255), primary key (id) )

changeSet.author: NataPetra
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE history ( id INT AUTO_INCREMENT, personId INT NOT NULL, information VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, mydate TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY(id) );

changeSet.author: NataPetra
changeSet.sql:
CREATE TRIGGER Person_INSERT AFTER INSERT ON Person FOR EACH ROW
INSERT INTO history(personId, information) VALUES(NEW.id,CONCAT('Add user: ', NEW.name, ' ' ,NEW.surname));
